name: read-range-ack
description: Represents a BACnet ReadRange ACK, used to acknowledge a ReadRange request and provide the result data.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object being read.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The property identifier specifying the property being read.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: Optional array index for the property.

fields.name: result-flags
fields.description: Flags indicating the position and availability of items in the result set.

fields.name: item-count
fields.description: The number of items returned in the result.

fields.name: item-data
fields.description: The data items returned in the result.

fields.name: first-sequence-number
fields.description: Optional sequence number of the first item in the result.
